c74object.name: fl.ticks~
c74object.digest: Counts how many frames have passed up to a specified value (0 based)..
c74object.description: Counts how many frames have passed up to a specified value (0 based).

entry.name: 1. /value [int]
entry.description: Sets a new starting value at next trigger

entry.name: 2. /limit_mode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode for changes in threshold.
[0] - progress [1] - restart

entry.name: 3. /run_mode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the run mode.
[0] - run [1] - pause [2] - stop
